channel.title: Cook on Game6r
channel.description: Recent content in Cook on Game6r

item.title: Chicken Fettuccine Saras Cooking Class
item.description: Italian cooking lessons from a fiery and sultry cook are waiting for all users in the process of this game. In principle, everything is understandable purely intuitively, but at least the initial knowledge of the English language will not interfere. In fact, the process of passing itself is more like an arcade game combined with a puzzle, rather than standard cooking in the kitchen.

item.title: Cindy Cooking Cupcakes
item.description: There is an opinion that modesty prevents success. If a chef wants to be famous, he should not be modest, but talented and skillful! Start to comprehend the basics of the art of cooking with the main character of this game. True, you will also need knowledge of the English language in order to get the necessary products from the shelf.

item.title: Cooking After Workout
item.description: An excellent recipe for real Italian pizza is offered by the Chef game for those who love or want to learn how to cook. One condition that concerns the recipe: it will need to be translated from English into an understandable language. By the way, you can try to cook according to these recommendations not only in real life, but also in the process of passing. Immediately after the start, you will find yourself in the kitchen, where a pretty cook will wink.

item.title: Cooking Contest
item.description: Game Chef for children will not only be fun, but will also bring a lot of benefits. After all, it may be that it is she who will help you choose a profession. Passage does not require special talents. All you need to do is move the mouse accurately and follow the prompts. So it will be possible to cook cool virtual cakes for children online. Do not repeat this at home.

item.title: Doner Kebab Salade Tomates Oignons
item.description: Do you think people need another lawyer or economist or sales agent? Nonsense! People need high-quality and tasty shawarma! Do you think it’s so simple: you take pita bread, wrap meat in it and you’re done? Launch the game and learn the intricacies and secrets of cooking this ancient, delicious and healthy dish! Then repeat in your mother’s kitchen.

item.title: Mutton Biryani Saras Cooking Class
item.description: There is only one way to check how the name matches the content: start the game. The process of passing is relatively simple: the gamer needs to follow the instructions in the pictures. Management - by means of a mouse. During virtual cooking, users will receive the theoretical basis of cooking.

item.title: Pony Cooking Rainbow Cake
item.description: Very tasty game. It is not recommended to use it on an empty stomach. After all, you will have to cook not some kind of salad, but a sweet, fragrant, most delicate cake. Doing this is relatively easy. It is enough to move the cursor and click the mouse where the hint finger points. When you’re done playing, try to surprise your mom with a new dish.
